   - Anti-LGI1 encephalitis is more common in **middle-aged adults**, which aligns with the patient’s age (32 years). Other antibodies, such as anti-NMDA receptor (younger individuals) or anti-GABA-B receptor (older adults with malignancy), do not fit as well.
